channel.title: Notes on Max Mancini
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Max Mancini

item.title: Make a Website for Free
item.description: This page outlines all of the resources I used to create this website, for free. I’ll continue to update this page as I add more to the site. Full disclosure: I am not a computer geek. I’ve only ever taken one coding class during freshman year of college… and I hated it. But do not fear, you don’t have to be a pro programmer to make a website. Most of the layout will already be set up for you to just fill in the blanks.
